title: Hurricane - Livestock Preparation Before the Storm

tasks.task: Develop a herd health program for hurricane preparedness
subtasks: Ensure vaccinations are up to date
Identify unique animal IDs (e.g., hot brands, USDA tags)
Verify sufficient equipment for response to disasters
Stock feed and water for 1-2 weeks
Store feed in dry, secure location
Ensure backup power options (hand pumps, generators)
Prioritize evacuation of high-risk animals (e.g., expecting mothers)
Move animals to higher ground if flooding risk
Keep animals in open spaces or secure barns as appropriate
Ensure horses are properly stabled if needed
Take measures to calm and protect horses during storms
